What kind of power does the new "Lucy" have? Are the powers demonstrated by Luffy's replacement as Lucy based on a Devil Fruit or Haki?
It might be haki because the way he blocked Jesus Burgess' attack, but he didn't say armament haki, instead used some kind of technique.

What is Sabo's Power? Sabo has been shown to use Dragon type attacks in the latest episodes of One Piece. But does it have something to with Dragon Style of fighting(from Dragon Claw on Burgees), or has he eaten Ancient Zoan Type Dragon fruit (Dragon's breath on the Colosseum's fight ring) .
